name: Spacers play store
description:
Welcome to the world of Spacers. Spacers. is a new and addictive open source arcade game that is guided by the player's performance.

What is Spacers?
Spacers is a free and open source game. Spacers is inspired from the free
arcade game asteroids which is a very popular game in early 70s or 80s.

How to play Spacers?
In order to play spacers you need to drag two joystick. one is for movement and another joystick is for shooting and rotating the spaceship.

How Spacers Is different from other games?
In other game there is just game but we provide satisfaction to the costumer
and provide the best mobile experience that they never experienced in other arcade style games.
